Description: Bronze miniature lamp with a deep rounded body and a long voluted nozzle with a rounded tip and a semicircular wick-hole. The filling-hole is surrounded by a raised rim. At the rear is a square-sectioned vertical loop-handle with a broken ornament on top. The lamp stands on a raised ring-base with a sunken area within.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q3545)
